turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need to order a Starbucks beverage, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a grande mocha latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande mocha latte with 2% and no whipped cream, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Soldiers Field Road in Boston.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say soldier field road?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Soldiers Field Road, yep. I have it with an S at the end.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, i will send your order to the starbucks on soldiers field road, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much. Nope, that's going to be it. Thank you.
